plot: After the young wife of vaudevillian Eddie Foy passes away, he incorporates their seven children into the act and takes it on the road.
title: The Seven Little Foys
plot_es: After the young wife of vaudevillian Eddie Foy passes away, he incorporates their seven children into the act and takes it on the road.
plot_en: After the young wife of vaudevillian Eddie Foy passes away, he incorporates their seven children into the act and takes it on the road.

cast.role: Bryan Lincoln Foy, as a teen
cast.name: Billy Gray
